Easily one of the best of this genre.

Belated note that there's kind of a translation error—and idk if it's a carry-over from the Chinese translation. It's most notable on page 6 where it says "Takuya-san", but in the Japanese version, it's all Akane-chan. Like "Takuya" gets named once in the whole JP chapter, and it was on the first page.

(Also page 8 says like "Wow so cute I'm the real Kotone" but it was more "Wow so cute, as expected of Akane-chan")

Similar issue in page 15: two references to Akane were left out and now it sounds like he wants to become lovers with the girl he already is rather than Akane.

(akane struggled here)

Just a note. It kinda reads different, like wish fulfillment versus training her to be gay for her best friend.

body: @enchantist well, you're right, at least she was fusing with him and considered to be alive (half) and this guy is pretty kind (at least now). That's better than most of those possession/skinsuit out there (include his own doujin about ninja earlier)
